PropertyList.title: Skipjack Kathryn
PropertyList.text:
Refloating the ship gives you 10 seconds to back away or push over the grounding point. You may need to hold down the 'r' key until you are clear.
Vessel can be moved backwards by kedging (hold down the 'k' key). Vessel can be rotated to port or starbard by warping (hold down shift-k or alt-k). Note that kedging and warping deploy the anchor so you will need to weigh anchor (shift-b) before resuming sailing.
